title: BRIEF-India's Cyient Sept Quarter Consol Net Profit Falls
text:
BRIEF-India's Cyient Sept Quarter Consol Net Profit Falls

Stock Markets 12 minutes ago (Oct 17, 2019 15:54)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Cyient Sept Quarter Consol Net Profit Falls Oct 17 (Reuters) - Cyient Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 985 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.27 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 11.59 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 11.87 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * DECLARED INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 6 RUPEES A SHARE

BRIEF-India's Cyient Sept Quarter Consol Net Profit Falls
